offset

Inherited from PrimitivesBuilder.offset

The translation to apply to the geometry (after tilt has been applied).

orientationColors

orientationColors: boolean = false

stress

stress: Vector3 = Vector3.vector(1, 1, 1)

Inherited from PrimitivesBuilder.stress

  • Defined in davinci-eight/geometries/PrimitivesBuilder.ts:19

The scaling to apply to the geometry in the initial configuration. This has a slightly strange sounding name because it involves a reference frame specific transformation.

This may be replaced by a Matrix3 in future.

tilt

tilt: Spinor3 = Spinor3.one()

Inherited from PrimitivesBuilder.tilt

  • Defined in davinci-eight/geometries/PrimitivesBuilder.ts:24

The rotation to apply to the geometry (after the stress has been applied).
